Html:
Hi,

I am using wpf with MVVM in my application. I was trying to bind DescriptionString to legend of a Line Graph but , It throws me an error saying that  "Binding can only be set to Dependency property of dependency object". After receiving this error I tried converting StandardDescription class DescriptionString Property into a Dependency property, in D3 but unfortunately it's not working. Can somebody please help me with this.

 

Thanks & Regards,

T
